column1: #Text=Alien Encounter and The Living Seas at the Walt Disney World Resort are to open today with a makeover.
#Text=The Alien Encounter attraction at Tomorrowland in the Magic Kingdom has been revised to include Experiment 626 from the movie Lilo & Stitch.
#Text=, the dog-like blue creature will lash out of its tube and terrorise the audience.
#Text=The Galactic Federation's Grand Councilwoman, Captain Gantu and Agent Pleakley appear in this show, essentially a prequel to the movie.

#Text=At the Living Seas, Crush the sea turtle from the Disney/Pixar movie Finding Nemo will host a new exhibit called Turtle Talk, joining smaller Nemo exhibits, a mainstay at the attraction for several months.
#Text=Vegetarian shark Bruce will soon become part of a shark education exhibit.
#Text=According to publicity, the Turtle Talk show will run every 15 minutes, from 10:00 am to 7:00 pm.
#Text=A sign language interpreted performance will run on Fridays at 10:30 am.
#Text=Disney is holding the Stitch's Great Escape!
#Text=Sweepstakes, with prizes including a five-day, four night trip for four to Walt Disney World Resort.
